title: Workspace 1_725.png
description:
Thought we just drop this here - just experimenting with an ultra minimal install of budgie-remix.  Base Memory usage - less than 220MB RAM - Interested?
This "fresh" edition of budgie-remix is for people who love to customise absolutely everything about their desktop.
We'll be asking our budgie-remix-bug-busters to give this a first try (https://launchpad.net/~budgie-remix-bug-busters)
